items.sentence: Neither Tom nor Mary wants to do that today.
Tom isn't going to meet Mary at the airport.
Tom isn't going to get away with that again.
Tom is the one who always answers the phone.
Tom is only pretending that he's having fun.
Tom is looking for a way to make some money.
Tom is looking for a job with a good salary.
Tom is going to pick Mary up at the airport.
Tom is from Boston and Mary is from Chicago.
Tom has to stay in Boston for one more week.
Tom has been missing for almost three weeks.
Tom had nothing to do with the bank robbery.
Tom forgot to ask for permission to do that.
Tom didn't tell us what happened that night.
Tom didn't tell us what had happened to him.
Tom didn't tell me why he was avoiding Mary.
Tom didn't tell Mary what his last name was.
Tom didn't start talking until he was three.
Tom carries a gym bag with him all the time.
Tom can't work today. He's not feeling well.
Tom can't see very well without his glasses.
Tom came over last night to study with Mary.
Tom called Mary as soon as he got to Boston.
Tom asked me how many countries I'd visited.
Tom asked Mary what her sisters' names were.
Tom asked Mary to tell him where she'd been.
Tom asked Mary to find out what John wanted.
Tom asked Mary if she could give him a ride.
Tom and Mary wanted to watch the same movie.
Tom and Mary used to often do that together.
Tom and Mary have both spent time in prison.
Tom and Mary both fell and broke their arms.
My uncle gave me a friendly piece of advice.
I think it's good for you to read this book.
I had planned to visit the temple last week.
A young man is singing in front of the door.
I took off my sweater because it got warmer.
Many clients come to that lawyer for advice.
Can you call me back when you have a chance?
Can you really stay in Australia all summer?
Can you tell me exactly what you need to do?
Can you tell me exactly what you have to do?
Can you tell me exactly what has to be done?
We saw an old hut at the edge of the forest.
Tom slept on the floor wrapped in a blanket.
Tom will be flying to Australia next Monday.
I'm going to try to convince Tom to help us.
We went to the beach and built sand castles.
What exactly does an electrical engineer do?
We hope we don't have another losing season.
